1.content:
You climbed the stairs into the attic of your house. You hadn't moved very far (down the street in fact) but in order to stop feeling "homesick" you decided to go exploring the new house. It was really the only thing to do, seeing as your parents had left for a few nights. You took the skeleton key that led to the attic and thats where we find you now.

As you walk up the stairs, they creak slightly, showing the age of the house. You unlock the door which hinges open, also giving a faint creaking noise. You then venture into the attic. It didn't really look that different from your old attic, apart from the dust. You roamed around, walking through the small beams of sunlight being let in from the nearby window.

In the corner of the room, there was a trunk, an old one that looked almost like a pirate's treasure chest. You walk over and see that it has a place for a key, a skeleton key. You test your luck, and you are delighted when the key opens the chest. You open it and inside you see all sorts of strange things...like someone who had a baby had left them behind. Baby Powders, Oils, Diapers, A Big Book Claiming to be a Spell Book, and tons of other stuff.

On top of all this stuff was an envelope. You open it and read the following

"Hello. To you who found this trunk, greetings. I have left this here for your discovery. I hope you use it's contents to make yourself bigger and better, all the items are magic and have different ablities. Use with caution, but do have fun. Feel free to share!"

"Magic? Yeah right...but my friends would get a kick out of this stuff. Mom and Dad are out of town for the next few nights, so...party time" You say with a smile.

but first...what gender are you?

"Yo, dude, I found something really funny and nifty in my attic...come over!" you say to each of them

"Dudes...and lady friends" you say gesturing to Kaylee "Check this out." you say as you open the trunk.

"This letter claims that these items...

"...are for babies?" John asks as he examines a bottle of baby powder from the trunk.

"...yeah, but it says they are magic, having the power to transform you into a..."Big Baby" it says...not sure what that means, but boy...sounds interesting, doesn't it."

125.content:
You grab and pull out of the trunk one of the objects.

You look down and you see...
125.title: What Item?

info.brief_description: You find a trunk in the attic with things to make you a big baby. Party Time!
info.description:
You find a trunk in her attic, filled with supposed "magical" items that promise to make one a "big fat baby"

You doubt the magic, but decide to test it out by having a party with some friends.

Boy are you in for a BIG change.
